subTitle: Find answers to your questions about our tutoring services and educational approach.

faqs.question: What subjects are covered in the Student Package?
faqs.answer: The Student Package covers a wide range of subjects, including mathematics, sciences, languages, and humanities. Our tutors are qualified to assist students from elementary to university level in these areas.

faqs.question: Can I upgrade from the Student Package to the Excellence Package?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! You can upgrade to the Excellence Package at any time to benefit from more tutoring hours, unlimited access to premium resources, and personalized tracking. Contact our support team for a smooth transition.

faqs.question: How do online tutoring sessions work?
faqs.answer: Our online tutoring sessions take place via a secure video conferencing platform. Students can interact in real-time with their tutor, share their screen, use a virtual whiteboard, and access interactive educational resources.

faqs.question: What type of support is offered outside of tutoring sessions?
faqs.answer: All our students benefit from email support. The Student Package includes standard email support, while the Excellence Package offers priority 24/7 support, meaning faster response times and specialized assistance.

faqs.question: How often are online resources and tutorials updated?
faqs.answer: We regularly update our online resources and tutorials to reflect the latest educational trends and curriculum changes. Our material aims to be comprehensive and user-friendly for all skill levels and academic stages.

faqs.question: Does TutorMe offer services for schools or educational institutions?
faqs.answer: Yes, our School Programs are designed for educational institutions needing comprehensive tutoring services. We provide consultations, planning, and implementation of tutoring programs tailored to your school's needs. Contact us for a personalized quote.
